attributes.action: Ban the sale of subsidised food and drink and the drinking of alcohol in parliament for all.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the members of parliament to modernise, bring itself in to line with the rest of the public sector for which it is a part of. Drug and alcohol testing for all MP's, Lords and anyone at work in the grounds of parliament. The important decisions made in parliament by MP's and the Lord's should not be influenced by cheap alcohol freely available at their place of work.
